261700.「フフッ 成功ね。\n 魔の波動を使うときは 今の感覚を\n 忘れないで。:
Hit. Don't forget how you feel now when you
use the magic wave.

261701.「はじめてで こんなに うまくできるなんて。\n あなた やっぱり才能あるわ。も:
I can't believe I did so well for the first time. You are talented after all. It seems like you would have no problem taking on more
serious work.

261703.「どうして エテーネの村に 魔物が\n こんなに……。痛い……痛いよ……。\n:
Why are there so many monsters in Ethene
Village... ouch... ouch... <pc> Help!

261704.「いやだ！ オレは まだ死にたくない……。\n 死にたく……アァ……ッ！: No! I don't want to die... yet...

261705.「エテーネの村は もうおしまいだ……。 \n このままじゃ 全員 死んじまうよ…:
Ethene Village is finished... We will all
die... Help me <pc>...

261706.「死にたくない……死にたくないよ……。\n 助けて <pc>……。\n 助けて…:
I don't wanna die... don't wanna die... help
me <pc>... help me... help me...

261707.「<pc>さん！ ダメっ！\n 心の闇に 飲まれてはいけない！！:
<pc>! No! Do not let the Dark Mind
consume you!

261708.「絶望の色が どんどん濃くなっていく……。\n このまま 魔の波動が暴走してしま:
The color of despair is getting darker and
darker... If the demon wave continues to run
amok, <pc> will...!

261711.「……お前が 足を踏み入れたのは\n 絶望と憎悪にまみれた 修羅の道だ。\n 生:
What you've set foot on is a carnage of
despair and hatred. If you're half-heartedly
determined, turn back now.
